TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ThreadStartException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a failure occurs in a managed thread after the underlying operating system thread has been started, but before the thread is ready to execute user code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The exception returned by the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property provides information about the reason for the failure.
